batch.model
Class TestReader

java.lang.Object
  batch.model.TestReader

public class TestReader
extends Object

Parses a directory into the test suite. This object will enumerate test files, and TestBuilder will create actual test cases.

Author:
Kohsuke KAWAGUCHI
